info.description: API for the Predictive Analysis Engine, responsible for failure simulation, scaling analysis, and risk assessment.
info.title: Predictive Analysis Engine API

get.description: Retrieves a history of logged decisions with pagination

post.description: Logs a decision made by the system or a user

get.description: Fetches the current dependency graph snapshot with optional filtering by namespace
Checks if the API and connections to the Graph Engine are healthy
Returns services ordered by risk metrics (pagerank or betweenness)
Fetches a list of services and their status from the Graph Engine

post.description: Simulates adding a new service to the cluster (capacity planning)
Simulates a failure of a specific service and analyzes the impact
Simulates scaling a service and analyzes latency impact

get.description: Fetches telemetry metrics for edges between services
Fetches telemetry metrics for a specific service or all services
